column2: Aggressive Intrusion
column3: Aggressive Intrusion

column2: We've got them, Commander. Right out in the open.
column3: We've got them, Commander. Right out in the open.

column2: These guys are amateurs. Get eyes on them, take them out.
column3: These guys are amateurs. Get eyes on them, take them out.

column2: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: A milk run, just as we expected. Good work, Commander.
column3: A milk run, just as we expected. Good work, Commander.

column2: I don't know what went wrong, Commander, but we need to evac before we suffer any more losses.
column3: I don't know what went wrong, Commander, but we need to evac before we suffer any more losses.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: This is a straightforward battle, Commander. Finding a military lance in a backwater like this should be no challenge at all.
column3: This is a straightforward battle, Commander. Finding a military lance in a backwater like this should be no challenge at all.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Lance

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: Our intelligence confirms a lance of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military units is engaged in maneuvers on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, within a region we control. This is an aggressive action and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations are at risk as long as this lance is allowed to move unimpeded. Hunt down the enemy lance and eliminate it.
column3: Our intelligence confirms a lance of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military units is engaged in maneuvers on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, within a region we control. This is an aggressive action and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations are at risk as long as this lance is allowed to move unimpeded. Hunt down the enemy lance and eliminate it.

column2: Gone To Ground
column3: Gone To Ground

column2: We've got the enemy lance on radar, Commander.
column3: We've got the enemy lance on radar, Commander.

column2: They're in this area, and they've powered up—must have seen us coming in on our Leopard.
column3: They're in this area, and they've powered up—must have seen us coming in on our Leopard.

column2: Take them down and let's get out of here.
column3: Take them down and let's get out of here.

column2: It's damn hard to hide a single 'Mech, much less a whole lance of them. Good work, Commander.
column3: It's damn hard to hide a single 'Mech, much less a whole lance of them. Good work, Commander.

column2: This is a disaster. We need to cut our losses and get out of here.
column3: This is a disaster. We need to cut our losses and get out of here.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: We're in the middle of nowhere, Commander, so that means no witnesses. Convenient.
column3: We're in the middle of nowhere, Commander, so that means no witnesses. Convenient.

column2: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.
column3: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.

column2: Destroy Enemy Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Units

column2: An OPTIONAL primary objective to destroy the second enemy lance.
column3: An OPTIONAL primary objective to destroy the second enemy lance.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: Commander, we were tracking a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard DropShip through this region when we lost its signal. Orbital scans suggest the ship made landfall here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, probably hoping to go to ground and hide the military lance it was carrying. It would be convenient if that lance were to disappear, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts believe they've isolated the area the target lance is trying to hide in.
column3: Commander, we were tracking a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard DropShip through this region when we lost its signal. Orbital scans suggest the ship made landfall here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, probably hoping to go to ground and hide the military lance it was carrying. It would be convenient if that lance were to disappear, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts believe they've isolated the area the target lance is trying to hide in.

column2: Last 'Mech Standing
column3: Last 'Mech Standing

column2: This is going to be a stand-up fight, Commander - your lance against the opposing force's.
column3: This is going to be a stand-up fight, Commander - your lance against the opposing force's.

column2: Intel says that they're near your current location. Move in and clear them out.
column3: Intel says that they're near your current location. Move in and clear them out.

column2: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: Targets down, Commander! Let's get you home and collect our pay.
column3: Targets down, Commander! Let's get you home and collect our pay.

column2: Yeah, this is bad. I'm scrubbing this and bringing you home.
column3: Yeah, this is bad. I'm scrubbing this and bringing you home.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: Not much to say, Commander. Shoot to kill.
column3: Not much to say, Commander. Shoot to kill.

column2: Destroy Enemy Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Units

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: A lance of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} BattleMechs has been rampaging in {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} territory on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. They've been razing population centers, burning fields and refineries, looting storage facilities. They're clearly doing everything they can think of to drive our people out. This is terrorism, pure and simple. We need you to find them and destroy them - no escape, and no prisoners.
column3: A lance of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} BattleMechs has been rampaging in {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} territory on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. They've been razing population centers, burning fields and refineries, looting storage facilities. They're clearly doing everything they can think of to drive our people out. This is terrorism, pure and simple. We need you to find them and destroy them - no escape, and no prisoners.

column2: Letter of Marque
column3: Letter of Marque

column2: Enemies detected in the area, Commander.
column3: Enemies detected in the area, Commander.

column2: Move forward and clear them out.
column3: Move forward and clear them out.

column2: Remind these bandits what disciplined MechWarriors can do.
column3: Remind these bandits what disciplined MechWarriors can do.

column2: Good job, Commander. The people can get back to their lives again.
column3: Good job, Commander. The people can get back to their lives again.

column2: Not a good day. Let's pull out.
column3: Not a good day. Let's pull out.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: Commander, we can expect to face experienced pilots in elderly 'Mechs and vehicles. But be careful; there could be more of these 'bandits' than {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is letting on.
column3: Commander, we can expect to face experienced pilots in elderly 'Mechs and vehicles. But be careful; there could be more of these 'bandits' than {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is letting on.

column2: Destroy Enemy Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Units

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} citizens here have been suffering at the hands of a local band of brigands - remnants from a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} battalion that saw action in the Third Succession War. With no prospects or funds, they've become common criminals. You are to eliminate them, down to the last 'Mech and vehicle.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} citizens here have been suffering at the hands of a local band of brigands - remnants from a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} battalion that saw action in the Third Succession War. With no prospects or funds, they've become common criminals. You are to eliminate them, down to the last 'Mech and vehicle.

column2: Maginot Line
column3: Maginot Line

column2: This is the map grid we're tasked with clearing.
column3: This is the map grid we're tasked with clearing.

column2: Sweep the area, find any enemy guns and bunkers and destroy them.
column3: Sweep the area, find any enemy guns and bunkers and destroy them.

column2: Well done, Commander. That sure put a hole in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} defenses.
column3: Well done, Commander. That sure put a hole in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} defenses.

column2: There's no way to salvage this situation, Commander. Time to call it.
column3: There's no way to salvage this situation, Commander. Time to call it.

column2: Sumire reports movement, assume there are a mobile enemy force in the AO.
column3: Sumire reports movement, assume there are a mobile enemy force in the AO.

column2: We've faced fixed emplacements many times commander, but in this case they might not be obviously clustered around a base. If they have good lines of fire it could get interesting, but nothing we can't handle.
column3: We've faced fixed emplacements many times commander, but in this case they might not be obviously clustered around a base. If they have good lines of fire it could get interesting, but nothing we can't handle.

column2: Destroy Weapon Emplacement
column3: Destroy Weapon Emplacement

column2: Destroy Enemy Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Units

column2: Our scouts have observed {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military engineers constructing fortified gun emplacements in a contested region. We'd like you to locate and destroy all the heavy weapons and bunkers from a specific section of their line. You are free to engage any enemy mobile forces in the AO, we will provide additional compensation at standard rates for any elements you destroy.
column3: Our scouts have observed {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military engineers constructing fortified gun emplacements in a contested region. We'd like you to locate and destroy all the heavy weapons and bunkers from a specific section of their line. You are free to engage any enemy mobile forces in the AO, we will provide additional compensation at standard rates for any elements you destroy.

column2: Mopping Up
column3: Mopping Up

column2: This is the last known position of the enemy lance, Commander.
column3: This is the last known position of the enemy lance, Commander.

column2: Advance and get eyes on them. Let's see how badly damaged they really are.
column3: Advance and get eyes on them. Let's see how badly damaged they really are.

column2: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: That's all the survivors destroyed, Commander. Well done.
column3: That's all the survivors destroyed, Commander. Well done.

column2: That's enough; I'm pulling the plug on this operation, Commander.
column3: That's enough; I'm pulling the plug on this operation, Commander.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: A partial lance of damaged 'Mechs doesn't sound too bad, Commander. If we're able to bring them down mostly intact, this could mean excellent salvage opportunities.
column3: A partial lance of damaged 'Mechs doesn't sound too bad, Commander. If we're able to bring them down mostly intact, this could mean excellent salvage opportunities.

column3: Destroy Enemy Units

column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: After a recent skirmish with our forces, the surviving units of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} lance escaped the battlefield. We believe they've managed to partially repair their 'Mechs, and that means they're a loose end that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} would like to see tied off, permanently. Track down these survivors and finish them for good.
column3: After a recent skirmish with our forces, the surviving units of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} lance escaped the battlefield. We believe they've managed to partially repair their 'Mechs, and that means they're a loose end that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} would like to see tied off, permanently. Track down these survivors and finish them for good.

column2: Nosy Neighbors
column3: Nosy Neighbors

column2: Commander, you've arrived in the region where the enemy was last detected.
column3: Commander, you've arrived in the region where the enemy was last detected.

column2: Move forward and clear them out.
column3: Move forward and clear them out.

column2: We shouldn't let any of them get away, if we can help it.
column3: We shouldn't let any of them get away, if we can help it.

column2: Excellent work, Commander. Though I do wonder what they were looking for...
column3: Excellent work, Commander. Though I do wonder what they were looking for...

column2: That didn't go as planned, but we're done here. I wonder, though, if they'll find what they were looking for...

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: Commander, this could be a wild goose chase. Of course, if there's nothing to find, they haven't wasted the time of their own 'Mechs.

column2: For weeks now, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been scouting territory near {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}-controlled land. Previous surveys of this land shows nothing of interest, yet there they are. Whatever it is that they've found, we don't want them to have it. Go in there and destroy them.

column2: Distraction
column3: Distraction

column2: This is the place. Time to start the party, Commander.
column3: This is the place. Time to start the party, Commander.

column2: Our targets should be somewhere in this vicinity. Let's hit them hard and get them all looking in our direction.
column3: Our targets should be somewhere in this vicinity. Let's hit them hard and get them all looking in our direction.

column2: Oh, and remember there will likely be reinforcements, Commander.
column3: Oh, and remember there will likely be reinforcements, Commander.

column2: Well, I hope that distraction was sufficient for our friends' purposes.
column3: Well, I hope that distraction was sufficient for our friends' purposes.

column2: What a disaster. I only hope our failure doesn't get our friends caught.
column3: What a disaster. I only hope our failure doesn't get our friends caught.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: I really like 'loud and fatal' as a job description, Commander. I may get it put on a plaque.

column2: We're planning an operation and to pull it off, we need the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities to be temporarily distracted. We need you to create that distraction. We'll point you at a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} patrol. You do something loud and fatal to them. Meanwhile, we execute our operation and give you a cut of the proceeds. Oh, and there may be reinforcements. That's good; that's one less lance to get in our way.

column2: Fall back, Commander. This is over.

column2: I don't believe that \"mission of mercy\" line for a second, but there isn't anything here to be concerned about.

column2: Commander, we're trying to safely transport injured personnel to one of our facilities on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. Unfortunately, satellite surveillance has shown {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units operating in the region we're expecting to move our medical convoy through. We need a mercenary lance to sweep the area and eliminate any {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units. Please think of this contract as a mission of mercy.
column3: Commander, we're trying to safely transport injured personnel to one of our facilities on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. Unfortunately, satellite surveillance has shown {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units operating in the region we're expecting to move our medical convoy through. We need a mercenary lance to sweep the area and eliminate any {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units. Please think of this contract as a mission of mercy.

column2: Trap Sprung
column3: Trap Sprung

column2: We're in the area where the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} 'Mech was sighted.
column3: We're in the area where the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} 'Mech was sighted.

column2: Move up and make contact; let's see what sort of trap this is.
column3: Move up and make contact; let's see what sort of trap this is.

column2: Stay alert, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Stay alert, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: That's all of them, Commander. Good shooting.

column2: That's enough; I'm pulling the plug on this operation, Commander.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: We're getting a number of reports from agents on the ground of a powerful 'Mech sporting {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} colors. A single 'Mech operating on its own, out in the middle of nowhere, sounds like a trap. Our plan is to spring this trap and see who comes to investigate. Engage the 'Mech, intercept the forces {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} sends to defend it, and destroy all of them.
column3: We're getting a number of reports from agents on the ground of a powerful 'Mech sporting {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} colors. A single 'Mech operating on its own, out in the middle of nowhere, sounds like a trap. Our plan is to spring this trap and see who comes to investigate. Engage the 'Mech, intercept the forces {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} sends to defend it, and destroy all of them.
